=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Review Date: 2014/12/21
Store: Andy Serkis  (Actor),     Jason Clarke  (Actor),     Matt Reeves  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, Action, General
Product Description: ['Gary Oldman, Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke and Keri Russell star in this thrilling next chapter of the Planet of the Apes. It is 2026, and humanity has been pushed to near extinction by a deadly virus. When a group of survivors desperate to find a new source of power travel into the woods near San Francisco, they discover a highly evolved community of intelligent apes led by Caesar (Andy Serkis). The two species form a fragile peace but dissention grows and the groups find themselves hurtling toward all-out war.']
Average Rating: 4.7

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Preferences:** Shows an interest in action and sci-fi genres, particularly in films that explore themes of survival, conflict, and evolution.
- **Rating Behavior:** The user rated a product significantly lower than its average rating, indicating high expectations or specific dissatisfaction with certain elements of the film.
- **Engagement with Actors and Directors:** The choice to purchase a DVD featuring notable actors and a well-known director suggests an appreciation for talent and perhaps a preference for recognized names in the industry. 
- **Format Preference:** Prefers physical media (DVD format), indicating an affinity for tangible collections or the experience of watching films on a disc rather than streaming.
- **Viewing Style:** Likely enjoys watching films that involve moral complexities and societal themes, given the premise of the chosen movie which involves issues of coexistence and conflict between humans and apes. 

Overall, this user appears to appreciate high-quality storytelling in cinema but may be critical of films that do not meet their standards.
